id="object">object</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">player_log_in</field><next><block type="controls_if"><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="logic_variable"><field name="variable">AutoRegenDialogues</field><field name="config">CUSTOM:RitualsOfTheWildsConfig</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="variables_set_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="VAL"><block type="file_variable"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">rituals_of_the_wilds_chernobog_33.json</field></block></value><value name="location"><block type="text_join"><mutation items="2"></mutation><value name="ADD0"><block type="get_game_directory"></block></value><value name="ADD1"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">/config/Rituals_of_the_wilds/dialogues/eng</field></block></value></block></value></block></value><next><block type="create_file"><mutation xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" is_player_var="false" has_entity="false"></mutation><field name="VAR">local:file</field><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First dialogue Based with reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Bad Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Neutral Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Normal Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Good Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">High Reputation</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Leshy... yes. I remember his voice before it barked through leaves. We were not enemies — not in the way you think. He slowed entropy. I fed it. Both necessary. Two ends of the same breath.  But he chose to fall. To root himself. Now he hides behind branches, prays through mushrooms. He fears what we are.  He would save the world from rot. I would teach it how to thrive in decay.</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Text Line</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">》 Is there no peace between you?</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Quest Requirement</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Quest Requirement State</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Dialogue Number</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Command</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">tellraw @s "<Chernobog> Peace is stagnation. There is only movement — forward, or into the earth."</field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Quest Give ID</field></block></value><value name="value"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT"></field></block></value><next><block type="add_json_property"><field name="JOBJVAR">local:object</field><value name="name"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">First Answer Result Command Player, World or Entity
